2H_sword.name: Zwerchhau
2H_sword.description: A powerful horizontal cut meant to interrupt an opponent’s attack and counter simultaneously.

effects.notes: Increased chance to counter on successful hit.

2H_sword.name: Absetzen
2H_sword.description: Deflect and immediately thrust into the opponent’s opening.

2H_sword.name: Durchwechseln
2H_sword.description: Change through under the opponent’s guard to reposition and strike.

2H_sword.name: Half-Sword Thrust
2H_sword.description: Grip the blade and thrust with precision into weak armor points.

2H_sword.name: Mordhau
2H_sword.description: Grip the blade and use the pommel or crossguard to bludgeon.

effects.notes: Deals blunt damage with a slashing weapon.

2H_sword.name: Aimed Leg Strike
2H_sword.description: Target the opponent’s legs to cripple mobility.

effects.notes: Deals full damage to unarmored legs, -30 penalty.

2H_sword.name: Krumphau
2H_sword.description: Crooked strike to the side, aiming at hands or arms.

2H_sword.name: Scheitelhau
2H_sword.description: Parting strike to the head, quick vertical cut.

effects.notes: High chance for head wound, vulnerable to counters.

2H_sword.name: Schielhau
2H_sword.description: Squinting strike, feint and invert blade to thrust.

effects.notes: Deals with extended blades, targets throat.

2H_sword.name: Exchange Thrust
2H_sword.description: Exchange thrusts by covering and counter-thrusting quickly.

effects.notes: Breaks opponent’s thrust, enters close play.

2H_sword.name: Break Thrust
2H_sword.description: Beat opponent’s thrust to the ground and follow up.

effects.notes: Strong defense, disarms or disbalances foe.

2H_sword.name: Underhand Thrust
2H_sword.description: Powerful upward thrust mimicking boar’s tusk.

effects.notes: Targets face or torso, follows with downward strike.

1H_sword.name: Thrust
1H_sword.description: A quick thrust aimed at the opponent's torso or face.

1H_sword.name: Parry and Riposte
1H_sword.description: Deflect an attack and immediately counter with a slash.

1H_sword.name: Pommel Strike
1H_sword.description: Use the pommel to strike the opponent, stunning them briefly.

1H_sword.name: Disarm Attempt
1H_sword.description: Attempt to knock the opponent's weapon from their hand.

1H_sword.name: Aimed Head Strike
1H_sword.description: Target the head for a potentially devastating blow.

effects.notes: +20% chance of critical hit, but -30 penalty against helmets.

1H_sword.name: Oberhau
1H_sword.description: Downward diagonal cut from high guard.

1H_sword.name: Unterhau
1H_sword.description: Upward diagonal cut from low guard.

1H_sword.name: Mittelhau
1H_sword.description: Horizontal middle cut protecting the head.
